name: L.A. Noire

task.description: Hold tight while we install some winetricks
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/L.A.Noire/LANLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_42 d3dx9_43 vcrun2008 win7
    arch: win32
    description: Hold tight while we install some winetricks
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $GAMEDIR/3rd/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /Silent
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/L.A.Noire/3rd/Social
      Club Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/L.A.Noire/3rd/Social
      Club Setup.exe
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/L.A.Noire/3rd
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/3rd"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/3rd/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/L.A.Noire/Social
      Club Setup.exe
wine:
  version: tkg-3.21-x86_64
